title: Inquiry Competency Enhancement Program through Open-Ended Chemistry Experiment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based digital materials and weekly in-person laboratory sessions

learning_goals: Students can apply gradual scaffolding in open-ended experimental design to independently develop multi-phase (3+) experimental plans
Learners can analyze unexpected experimental outcomes (e.g., response delays, measurement errors) and propose solutions
Small group members can divide roles (recorder, executor, reviewer) during experiments and perform collaborative decision-making

resources: Basic Chemistry Experiment Kit (Safety Goggles, Beakers, Thermometer, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
